meanings.definition: An attack made in response to a raid.
meanings.sent1: After the enemy's raid, our counterraid was swift and effective.
meanings.sent2: The counterraid by the defenders caught the invaders off guard.
meanings.sent3: The counterraid turned the tables on the attackers, surprising them.
meanings.sent4: The counterraid was like a sudden storm, striking back fiercely.
meanings.sent5: The counterraid was a bold move that changed the course of the battle.

meanings.definition: To make a raid in response to an attack.
meanings.sent1: We decided to counterraid their base after they attacked ours.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers counterraided the enemy camp under the cover of darkness.
meanings.sent3: The troops counterraided with determination, seeking revenge.
meanings.sent4: She counterraided with precision, hitting back strategically.
meanings.sent5: The commander counterraided swiftly, showing no mercy to the aggressors.
